freemarker.template.utility

接口 ObjectWrapperWithAPISupport

  • 所有超级接口:
    ObjectWrapper
    所有已知子接口:
    RichObjectWrapper
    所有已知实现类:
    BeansWrapper, DefaultObjectWrapper, RhinoWrapper, SimpleObjectWrapper

    public interface ObjectWrapperWithAPISupport
extends ObjectWrapper
    Experimental - subject to change: Implemented by ObjectWrapper-s to help TemplateModel-s to implement the someValue?api operation.

    Experimental status warning: This interface is subject to change on non-backward compatible ways, hence, it shouldn't be implemented outside FreeMarker yet.

    从以下版本开始:
    2.3.22

    • 字段概要

      • 从接口继承的字段 freemarker.template.ObjectWrapper

        BEANS_WRAPPER, DEFAULT_WRAPPER, SIMPLE_WRAPPER

    • 方法概要

      所有方法 实例方法 抽象方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      TemplateHashModel wrapAsAPI(Object obj)
      Wraps an object to a TemplateModel that exposes the object's "native" (usually, Java) API.

      • 从接口继承的方法 freemarker.template.ObjectWrapper

        wrap

    • 方法详细资料

      • wrapAsAPI

        TemplateHashModel wrapAsAPI(Object obj)
                     throws TemplateModelException
        Wraps an object to a TemplateModel that exposes the object's "native" (usually, Java) API.
        参数:
        obj - The object for which the API model has to be returned. Shouldn't be null.
        返回:
        The TemplateModel through which the API of the object can be accessed. Can't be null.
        抛出:
        TemplateModelException
        从以下版本开始:
        2.3.22
